ENDED 9 APR.

Upgrading my Cobb Portraits.

Great Investment opportunity! 

Strong Appreciation history, sample recent PSA 1.5 Green Portrait Auction Sales follow:

Excellent Registry: Centering, Color and Photo.

Sale Price:  $NFS , Check only pls.

Reply to [url]arkansas2014@gmail.com[/url]

Nice display example for a low grade set.  Currently in a PSA Lucite holder in my Home Office.

Steve
